p.The Civics Teaching Certificate program: The Civics Teaching Certificate program will provide specialized knowledge in civics teaching in Florida focusing on content, pedagogy, assessment and civics-focused experiential learning which will enhance social studies education, political science, social science and interdisciplinary studies majors. Students pursuing social science teaching certification, including alternative certification, will develop specialized skills to teach civics and government geared toward Florida 6-12 instructional requirements. The program is open to all majors.

li.A minimum overall 2.5 GPA is required in: A minimum overall 2.5 GPA is required in courses used to satisfy the certificate.
li.At least 9 hours used in the certificate: At least 9 hours used in the certificate must be earned at UCF within the participating departments.
li.Students must satisfy each course's prer: Students must satisfy each course's prerequisites before enrolling in the class.

Admission Requirements
none
Certificate Requirements
A minimum overall 2.5 GPA is required in courses used to satisfy the certificate. 
At least 9 hours used in the certificate must be earned at UCF within the participating departments.
